title: Executive Order 8768-Amendment of Paragraph 6, Subdivision VI, Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by paragraph Eighth of subdivision SECOND of section 2 of the Civil Service Act of January 16, 1883 (22 Stat. 403, 404), paragraph 6, Subdivision VI of Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules is hereby amended to read as follows:
"6. All positions in the Federal Bureau of Investigation."
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8768-Amendment of Paragraph 6, Subdivision VI, Schedule A of the Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/372106
